def_cn: （以开车撞碎商店玻璃的方式进行的）飞车抢劫
def_en: A ram-raid is the crime of using a car to drive into and break a shop window in order to steal things from the shop.

def_cn: （以开车撞碎商店玻璃的方式进行）飞车抢劫
def_en: If people ram-raid, they use a car to drive into and break a shop window in order to steal things from the shop.
